content: Shushrooshakkaaran :- baarekmor, nammude daivamaaya kartthaavinte sneham moolam parishuddhavum divyavumaaya chumbanatthaal ororutthanum avanavante adutthavanu thammil thammil samaadhaanam kodukkanam.
Janam :- daivamaaya kartthaave! Nyangallude aayushkaalam muzhuvanum ee samaadhaanatthinu nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.

1. Anyonyam shlommo nalkin,
Kartthaavin shlommo nammil
/tvaasam cheytheedattennum,
/tthammil chumbikkenam naam
Thalshlommoyum shainoyum namme kaakkattennaallum.

2. Maallikayil shishyanmaaro-
Duththhaanatthin naallukallil
/tnaathhan kalppichaanevam
/tshlommo! Priyare! Ningallilee-
Shlommo vaazhattennaallum lokaantyatthollam thanne.

3. Anyonyam snehikkaname
Nnothiya naathhaa! Nin sneham
/tvaaneedanamengallilennum
/tsthuthi, daivatthinnuyaratthil
Bhoothalamengum nal shaanti maanavaridayil sampreethi.
Shushrooshakkaaran:- kodukkappettirikkunna parishuddhavum divyavumaaya ee samaadhaanatthinu shesham karunayulllla kartthaavinte mumpaake naam thala kunikkanam.
Janam :- nyangallude kartthaavum (nyangallude) daivavume ninte thirumumpaake nyangall thala kunikkunnu.

Shushrooshakkaaran :- baarekmor. Sahodarangalle naam ellaavarum bhamgiyodum bhayatthodum vanakkatthodum, vedippodum vishuddhiyodum snehatthodum sathyavishvaasatthodum, nalla daivabhakthiyodum koode ninnu (bahumaanappetta ee pattakkaarante) kaikallaal nammude mumpaake vaykkappettirikkunna bhayangkaravum parishuddhavumaaya ee kurbbaanayil sookshikkanam. Entennaal naam ellaavarkkum vendi jeevanulllla bali sakalatthinteyum udayavanaaya pithaavaam daivatthinu nirappilum samaadhaanatthilum anaykkunnu.
Janam : (ee kurbbaana) anugrahangallum samaadhaanavum baliyum sthothravum aakunnu.
